t: The*pn Lord*s is my shepherd; I*ln have what I need.
He*ln lets me lie down in green pastures; he*ln leads me beside quiet waters.
He*ln renews my life; he*ln leads me along the right paths for*ln his name’s sake.
Even*ln when I go through the darkest valley, I*ln fear no danger, for*ln you are with me; your*ln rod and your staff - they comfort me.
You*pn prepare a table before me in*ln the presence of my enemies; you*ln anoint my head with oil; my*ln cup overflows.
Only*ln goodness and faithful love will pursue me all*ln the days of my life, and*ln I will dwell in the house of the Lord*s as*ln long as I live.
